Description:
LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION!
Move-In Ready!
Exclusive Neighborhood!
Free Parking!
Garage Option Available! 
You will not find a more unique neighborhood! Whats being offered here is a bedroom in a beautifully built Town home only a few feet from DC. This neighborhood included over 200 luxury homes and town homes, newly paved streets, a scenic pond, new walking trials, a dog park and much more. 
-Less than a 10 minute walk to the Addison Road Metro
-Two Bus Stops Right outside Subdivision
-Direct Shot to the Capitol Building (15 minutes)
The House includes:
-Access to a newly renovated Gourmet kitchen 
-Beautiful Deck over looking a scenic pond.
-New Washer and dryer
-Sony 55' inch 4K TV in living room with Xfinity X1 on Demand!
-We would prefer students or young professionals but all are welcomed.
-(Possible) Access to a Garage. For an additional monthly fee you will receive a garage key be able to park your car in the garage.
-Comcast Xfinity, Cable, and home security system. Access the security system from anywhere in the world just using your phone.
-A safe, quiet place to live. Close to the Nation's Capital.
ROOM LOCATION, RENT: 
-This is an unfurnished bedroom. 
-Rent is $800/month first months' rent and deposit are needed to move in. 
-A standard credit and background check will be conducted. There are 2 rooms available. 
-There are 12 month, 6 month, and even Monthly leases available. Perfect for those who need short term living arrangements for internships or job assignments.
Management: The property is managed by Brogden | Marshall, LLC. An access management firm. All credit and background checks will be conduct by Brogden | Marshall, LLC. Rent will be directly deposited into the company's account on the 1st of each month.
DISCLAIMERS: You will have to share a full bathroom with 1 other person. However, through proper vetting we will ensure that both tenants are both clean and respectfully of one another's space. As stated there are two rooms available. If you have a friend who is interested in renting the other room ($800/month).
ABOUT YOUR HOUSEMATES: 
-My name is Josh. I am 25 years old. I am a second year law student at Howard Law school in DC. I am originally from Atlanta Georgia. I am an Army veteran. I have been in the Army for over 7 years, and am still currently serving. 
- Graduated from The Ohio State University (GO Buckeyes!)
- I do not have any pets.
- I am very clean and respectful of others and their space. I spend most of my time studying. 
- I love to cook.
ABOUT YOU: No smoking (inside). If you own a car, there is ALOT of space to park your car.This place is perfect for a quiet student/young professional who wants to be at the center of things and near lots of public transportation options, but likes a residential vibe. Personality-wise, you must be easy going, considerate, good at communicating + play well with others. No raging parties, loud music into the night, etc. 
****STUDENT DISCOUNT**** We offer a $100 discount for the FIRST MONTHS RENT making the FIRST MONTHS rent $700, to any Graduate student who signs a lease before October 1, 2017.
When you email, PLEASE SHARE SOMETHING ABOUT YOURSELF. Living habits, will it bother you if we meet for coffee, lunch or dinner one day? As roommates it is important to know each other well to facilitate a comfortable living environment!
